doc.field: Richard Maass Westchester and New York State History Collection
Richard Maass Westchester and New York State History Collection
Subseries A: Newspapers and Other Printed Materials
Subseries A: Newspapers and Other Printed Materials

Series V: Subseries A contains one legal box and two flat boxes of newspapers. Small-sized newspapers are arranged in alphabetical order in the legal box. A second alphabetical arrangement of larger-sized newspapers are housed in two flat boxes. Folders 55 through 62 contain manuscripts that were not assigned folder numbers during the original processing of the collection.
